Spotted Fever Rickettsiosis (Tests for Rickettsia species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    48863-5 Rickettsia sp DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by RFLP
    48869-2 Rickettsia sp DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49127-4 Rickettsia sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Sequencing
    53608-6 Rickettsia sp DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    67726-0 Rickettsia sp DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
